content: df.dropNulls() // remove rows with null value in any column df.dropNulls(whereAllNull = true) // remove rows with null values in all columns df.dropNulls { city } // remove rows with null value in 'city' column df.dropNulls { city and weight } // remove rows with null value in 'city' OR 'weight' columns df.dropNulls(whereAllNull = true) { city and weight } // remove rows with null value in 'city' AND 'weight' columns
